title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for p'(t)

1 point is earned for sign analysis for p'(t)

1 point is earned for the answer

p'(t)=−2. π 4 sin( π 4 t) p'(T)=0 when t=0 and t=4 p'(t)<0 for 0<t<4 p'(t)>0 for 4<t<6 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGceaqabeaacaWGWb Gaai4jaiaacIcacaWG0bGaaiykaiabg2da9iabgkHiTiaaikdacaGG UaWaaSaaaeaacqaHapaCaeaacaaI0aaaaiGacohacaGGPbGaaiOBai aacIcadaWcaaqaaiabec8aWbqaaiaaisdaaaGaamiDaiaacMcaaeaa caWGWbGaai4jaiaacIcacaWGubGaaiykaiabg2da9iaaicdacaqGGa Gaae4DaiaabIgacaqGLbGaaeOBaiaabccacaWG0bGaeyypa0JaaGim aiaabccacaqGHbGaaeOBaiaabsgacaqGGaGaaeiDaiaab2dacaqG0a aabaGaaeiCaiaabEcacaqGOaGaaeiDaiaabMcacaqG8aGaaeimaiaa bccacaqGMbGaae4BaiaabkhacaqGGaGaaeimaiaabYdacaqG0bGaae ipaiaabsdaaeaacaqGWbGaae4jaiaabIcacaqG0bGaaeykaiaab6da caqGWaGaaeiiaiaabAgacaqGVbGaaeOCaiaabccacaqG0aGaaeipai aabshacaqG8aGaaeOnaaaaaa@75FD@
